content: Answer: Hi there, I'm doing well, thanks for asking. How about you?
Who is the founder of the Mystery vibe ?

The founder of Mysteryvibe is Dr. Soum Rakshit. He is a biomedical engineer and entrepreneur with a PhD and post-doc in biomedical engineering. He previously created a start-up in eye-recognition which was acquired by a US defence company. In 2014, Soum started Mysteryvibe to bring defence electronics and medical expertise together and create devices that solve big areas in sexual health in an accessible way.
Great !, please tell me more about the company and what it is ?

MysteryVibe is a sexual health technology company that creates products to improve people's lives. Founded in 2014 by Dr. Soum Rakshit, MysteryVibe is on a mission to normalize sexual health and make solutions for major sexual health issues accessible to all. The company has created 6 FDA Class 2 medical devices addressing genito-pelvic pain, penetration pain, erectile dysfunction, delayed ejaculation and prostate health. MysteryVibe has also published 3 journal papers, won 30+ international awards, and is recommended by leading hospitals like Charite, King’s College, Barts, Mayo Clinic, Cedars-Sinai and others. The company's flagship product, Crescendo, is the world’s first ultra-flexible vibrator that adapts to your body shape and delivers precise vibrations exactly where you need.
You're welcome! Is there anything else I can help you with?
Sorry, I don't understand the question.
